algorithm: In the new algorithm, the scores for the bins will be calculated by taking the reciprocal of the difference between the bin capacity and the item size, multiplying it by the logarithm of the bin capacity divided by the item size, and then normalizing the scores by dividing them by the sum of all scores.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    # Calculate the scores for the bins
    difference = bins - item
    scores = np.log(bins / item) / difference
    normalized_scores = scores / np.sum(scores)
    
    return scores
